description: Ingredients displayed for the Indian Butter Chicken recipe

content: "Listed here are all the ingredients you need to prepare the delectable Indian Butter Chicken:

description: Bowl with the combined marinade ingredients

content: "Combine plain yogurt, lemon juice, chili powder, cumin, turmeric, garam masala, coriander, cayenne pepper, ginger, and garlic in a bowl for the marinade."

description: Chicken pieces being added to the marinade

content: "Add the bite-sized chicken thigh pieces to the marinade, ensuring each piece is thoroughly coated. Refrigerate for optimal flavor."

description: Chicken cooking in a pan with melted butter

content: "Melt unsalted butter in a pan, add the marinated chicken, and cook until no longer pink for juicy textures and vibrant flavors."

description: Tomato sauce being poured over the cooked chicken

content: "Pour tomato sauce over the cooked chicken, stirring well for a rich and aromatic base. Simmer for 20 minutes over low heat to infuse flavors."

description: Heavy cream being poured into the simmering chicken

content: "Stir in heavy cream, allowing it to simmer for an additional 10 minutes to create a creamy and luscious texture."

description: Ready Butter Chicken garnished with cilantro

content: "Season with salt, garnish with fresh cilantro, and serve the piping hot Indian Butter Chicken with rice or naan. Enjoy the exquisite flavors of this homemade delight!"
